title: (x) Andalucia campaign - extended Verdana {Yves}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221238im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19665.jpg)   
   
saw an andulucia tourism campaign on the airport yesturday. unfortunately the website doesnt offer any other images than the one attached. i'm looking for the one on the right hand site (sun and sun). sorry, didnt find any better image of it.   
it has some eurostile extended feeling, but it isnt.   
thanks: lars
author: lars

comments.content: indeed, is there an extended version of it somewhere? thanks: lars
